item.title: 金融科技贷款机构 SoFi 在创纪录的季度业绩后上调 2025 年利润预期
item.description: 本周二，SoFi Technologies 将其年度利润预期上调至高于华尔街预期的水平，原因是基于收费的收入激增推动了这家金融科技巨头创纪录的第三季度业绩。【原文：SoFi Technologies raised its annual profit forecast above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday after a surge in fee-based revenue fueled record third-quarter results for the financial technology major.】

item.title: PayPal 与 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT 达成支付钱包协议，股价大涨
item.description: PayPal 周二宣布与人工智能巨头 OpenAI 合作，允许 ChatGPT 用户使用该支付公司即时结账，这使其股价在盘前交易中上涨了 13%。【原文：PayPal on Tuesday announced a partnership with AI giant OpenAI to allow ChatGPT users to check out instantly using the payments firm, sending its shares up 13% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 皇家加勒比预计季度利润低于预期
item.description: 本周二，在燃料成本上升和经济不确定性增加的情况下，皇家加勒比预计本季度利润低于预期。【原文：Royal Caribbean forecast current-quarter profit below expectations on Tuesday, amid higher fuel costs and rising economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 美股期货在近期反弹后持稳，关注大型企业财报
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货徘徊在纪录高点附近，在前一交易日的反弹后有所停顿，因为投资者关注主要企业的财报和本周晚些时候备受期待的美联储政策决定。【原文：U.S. stock index futures hovered near record highs on Tuesday, pausing after a rally in the previous session as investors focused on major corporate earnings and a much-anticipated Federal Reserve policy decision expected later in the week.】

item.title: 墨西哥水泥公司第三季度业绩超出预期，原因是价格上涨和成本削减
item.description: 墨西哥水泥公司（Cemex）第三季度核心盈利超出预期，大幅增长 19%，原因是该公司提高了价格，并受益于成本削减措施。【原文：Mexico's Cemex beat estimates to post a 19% jump in third-quarter core earnings as it boosted prices and benefited from cost-cutting measures.】

item.title: 卡塔尔财长称人工智能将成为美国投资的重要组成部分，英国与海湾国家的贸易协议即将达成
item.description: 卡塔尔财政部长周二表示，人工智能将是卡塔尔计划在美国投资的重要组成部分。【原文：Qatar's finance minister said on Tuesday that artificial intelligence would be a big part of planned Qatari investments in the United States.】

item.title: 在 HoldCo 的 Comerica 行动之后，激进投资者将加大银行并购力度
item.description: 本月销售额达 109 亿美元【原文：This month's $10.9 billion sale】

item.title: UPS 季度利润下降
item.description: 美国联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service）周二报告称，第三季度利润下降，原因是成本削减未能抵消唐纳德-特朗普总统不断变化的贸易政策和减少为亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）递送包裹所带来的冲击。【原文：United Parcel Service reported a decline in third-quarter profit on Tuesday, as cost cuts failed to offset the hit from President Donald Trump's changing trade policies and a push to deliver fewer packages for Amazon.com.】

item.title: 美国参议员桑德斯就自动化对就业的影响向贝索斯和亚马逊提出挑战
item.description: 美国参议员伯尼-桑德斯（Bernie Sanders）周二呼吁亚马逊公司创始人杰夫-贝佐斯（Jeff Bezos）就自动化可能造成的数十万工作岗位流失做出解释。【原文：U.S. Senator Bernie Sanders on Tuesday called on Amazon.com founder Jeff Bezos to account for what the Vermont independent said were hundreds of thousands of potential lost jobs due to automation.】

item.title: 市场对流动性的担忧为美联储资产负债表缩减的结束蒙上阴影
item.description: 随着华尔街的预期迅速转向美联储缩减债券持有量的努力即将结束，一些分析师也预计资产负债表将在相对较短的时间内恢复扩张。【原文：As Wall Street's expectations have rapidly shifted toward an imminent end to the Federal Reserve's effort to shrink its bond holdings, some analysts also anticipate a return to balance sheet expansion in relatively short order.】

item.title: 英伟达黄晓明将在华盛顿发表演讲，投资者期待中国暗示
item.description: 英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋将于周二在美国首都发表主题演讲，投资者希望了解这家人工智能领军企业能够向庞大的中国市场出售哪些芯片。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang is set to give a keynote address in the U.S. capital on Tuesday, with investors looking for clarity on what chips the artificial intelligence leader will be able to sell to the vast Chinese market.】

item.title: 联合健康上调 2025 年利润预期，首席执行官期待 2026 年实现增长
item.description: 由于美国医疗保险公司控制了医疗成本，联合健康（UnitedHealth）周二上调了年度利润预期，此前该公司公布的季度盈利好于预期，使其股价在盘前交易中上涨了近 4%。【原文：UnitedHealth on Tuesday raised its annual profit forecast after reporting better-than-expected quarterly earnings as the U.S. health insurer kept medical costs in check, sending its shares up nearly 4% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 世界贸易组织（WTO）总裁呼吁在贸易混乱中改革协商一致规则
item.description: 世界贸易组织（WTO）负责人周二呼吁改革这个已有 30 年历史的机构，并强调了其共识规则，即需要成员一致同意才能达成全球贸易协议。【原文：The head of the World Trade Organization (WTO) on Tuesday called for reforms of the 30-year-old institution, highlighting its consensus rule that requires unanimous agreement among members to secure global trade deals.】

item.title: 史密斯菲尔德食品公司因肉类需求稳定而实现季度销售额和利润增长
item.description: 史密斯菲尔德食品公司（Smithfield Foods）周二公布第三季度收入和利润均大幅增长，原因是这家美国猪肉加工商受益于对价格较高的包装肉类和新鲜猪肉的强劲需求。【原文：Smithfield Foods posted a jump in third-quarter revenue and profit on Tuesday, as the U.S. pork processor benefited from resilient demand for higher-priced packaged meats and fresh pork.】

item.title: 诺华首席执行官表示，诺华将在美国扩大直接面向患者的销售业务
item.description: 瑞士制药商诺华公司首席执行官 Vas Narasimhan 周二在接受路透社采访时表示，该公司正在探索向其直接面向患者平台添加更多药品的方案，预计该平台将于 11 月 1 日在美国推出。【原文：Swiss drugmaker Novartis is exploring options to add more medicines to its direct-to-patient platform that is expected to launch in the U.S. on November 1, CEO Vas Narasimhan told Reuters in an interview on Tuesday.】

item.title: 亚马逊将裁减约 1.4 万个公司职位
item.description: 亚马逊周二表示，该公司将裁减约14000名员工，因为在人工智能投资不断膨胀的情况下，这家科技巨头将削减运营层级以限制成本。【原文：Amazon said on Tuesday it will reduce its corporate workforce by about 14,000 roles, as the tech giant cuts down on operational layers to limit costs amid ballooning investments in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 软银、GE Vernova 等公司对日本的 5500 亿美元美国投资计划感兴趣
item.description: 日本和美国周二发布的一份情况说明书显示，约有 20 家日本和美国公司对东京计划投资 5500 亿美元的一揽子项目表示了兴趣。【原文：About 20 companies from Japan and the U.S. have expressed interest in projects that are part of Tokyo's planned $550-billion investment package, a factsheet issued by the two countries showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 金融高管称美国将继续主导全球投资流动
item.description: 主要金融公司的负责人周二在沙特阿拉伯举行的一次会议上表示，美国将继续吸引绝大多数投资流，世界最大经济体经济放缓的风险被过分夸大了。【原文：The United States will continue to draw the vast majority of investment flows and the risks of a slowdown in the world's largest economy are overblown, the heads of major financial firms said at a conference in Saudi Arabia on Tuesday.】

item.title: 人工智能推动 Advantest 将利润预期提高 25
item.description: 日本 Advantest 公司周二将截至 2026 年 3 月的运营利润预期上调了 25%，达到 3,740 亿日元（合 24.8 亿美元），原因是人工智能支出推动了对其芯片测试设备的需求。【原文：Japan's Advantest on Tuesday hiked its operating profit forecast for the year ending March 2026 by 25% to 374 billion yen ($2.48 billion) as spending on artificial intelligence drives demand for its chip testing equipment.】

item.title: 英国加密货币公司 KR1 瞄准伦敦主板市场上市
item.description: 英国加密货币公司 KR1 周二表示，计划将其股票上调至伦敦证券交易所主板市场，以提高其知名度并扩大投资者基础。【原文：British cryptocurrency company KR1 said on Tuesday it plans to uplist its stock to the main market of the London Stock Exchange, to enhance its visibility and broaden investor base.】

item.title: 投资者期待米莱伊中期选举获胜后阿根廷掀起新一轮改革浪潮
item.description: 在阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊执政的前两年大部分时间里，市场涨势一浪高过一浪，投资者期待他能将其政党重新绘制的选举地图转化为全面的劳动和税收改革，从而释放数十亿美元的外国投资。【原文：After riding a wave of market gains for most of the first two years of Argentine President Javier Milei's government, investors expect him to turn his party's redrawing of the electoral map into sweeping labor and tax reforms that could unlock billions of dollars in foreign investment.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行以 8 亿美元收购美国贷款公司 Best Egg
item.description: 英国巴克莱银行周二表示，将以 8 亿美元的价格收购美国个人贷款发放商 Best Egg，以扩大其在美国的个人银行业务规模。【原文：Barclays will buy U.S. personal loan originator Best Egg for $800 million, the British bank said on Tuesday, as it tries to add scale in its personal banking business in the United States.】

item.title: Clearview AI 因涉嫌侵犯隐私在奥地利面临刑事指控
item.description: 奥地利隐私组织 noyb 周二表示，它已在奥地利提起刑事诉讼，指控总部位于美国的 Clearview AI 公司非法收集欧盟居民的照片和视频，用于建立面部识别数据库。【原文：Austrian privacy group noyb said on Tuesday it has filed a criminal complaint in Austria, accusing U.S.-based Clearview AI of illegally collecting photos and videos of European Union residents to build its facial-recognition database.】

item.title: SK 集团董事长称，人工智能数据中心的快速发展造成了瓶颈
item.description: SK 集团董事长崔泰源（Chey Tae-won）周二表示，人工智能数据中心的爆炸式增长正在为芯片和其他关键供应品制造 "瓶颈"。【原文：The explosive growth in artificial intelligence data centres is creating "bottlenecks" for chips and other key supplies, SK Group Chairman Chey Tae-won said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 比亚迪的微型汽车野心可能会为日本敲响警钟
item.description: 比亚迪的日本微型车要到明年年底才能上市，但它已经引起了热议--至少在担心来自中国最大汽车制造商挑战的东京官员中是这样。【原文：BYD's Japanese mini-car will not go on sale until the end of next year, but it has already created buzz - at least among officials in Tokyo worried about the challenge from China's biggest automaker.】

item.title: 野村报告第二季度净利润下降 6
item.description: 日本最大的经纪和投资银行野村控股公司周二报告称，该公司 7-9 月份的净利润下降了 6%。【原文：Japan's largest brokerage and investment bank Nomura Holdings reported on Tuesday a 6% drop in net profit over the July-September quarter.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，苹果供应商 Skyworks 曾洽谈以 80 亿美元收购竞争对手 Qorvo
item.description: The Information 周二援引知情人士的话报道称，为苹果和其他智能手机制造商提供射频芯片的 Skyworks Solutions 最近几个月就收购竞争对手 Qorvo 进行了谈判。【原文：Skyworks Solutions , which supplies radio frequency chips to Apple and other smartphone makers, held talks in recent months to buy rival Qorvo , The Information reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 世创电子材料下调 2025 年利润率预期
item.description: 世创电子材料（Siltronic）本周二发布的季度财报显示，受汇率负面影响以及交付工作转入下一季度的影响，该公司的年度核心利润率前景有所收窄。【原文：Siltronic on Tuesday narrowed its annual core profit margin outlook after posting a weaker-than-expected quarterly profit, impacted by negative currency effects and deliveries shifting into the next quarter.】

item.title: 凯捷公布第三季度有机增长 3% 后上调增长预期
item.description: 法国IT咨询公司凯捷（Capgemini）周二表示，其第三季度收入有机增长了2.9%，并上调了增长预期，理由是人工智能解决方案需求稳健，北美市场表现强劲。【原文：French IT consulting firm Capgemini said its third-quarter revenue increased by 2.9% organically and raised its growth forecast on Tuesday, citing solid demand for AI solutions and strong performance in North America.】

item.title: 管理着 11.5 万亿美元资产的投资者敦促食品公司从动物蛋白向多元化发展
item.description: 管理着 11.5 万亿美元资产的投资者呼吁大型食品公司和零售商将产品多样化，增加植物性蛋白质来源，以提高供应链的弹性，降低食品安全风险。【原文：Investors managing $11.5 trillion in assets are calling on major food companies and retailers to diversify into more plant-based protein sources to enhance supply chain resiliency and mitigate food security risks.】
